title: Loving Lebanon and Australia
creator_credit: Sam Haddad, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When Lebanese immigrant Sam Haddad migrated to Australia he encountered ignorance and racism but via a well timed punch, he learned the value of mateship and tolerance and began to love his adopted country.
creator_credit_for_label: Sam Haddad, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
